original_text: And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
korean_text: 그 밤 그 시각에 간수가 그들을 데려다가 그 맞은 자리를 씻어 주고 자기와 그 온 가족이 다 세례를 받은 후

sentences.original_text: And he took them the same hour of the night
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 밤 바로 그 시간에 그들을 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and he was baptized at once
